pullrequest.title: AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8 integration over ros topics with k_effort

content.raw: Are we expecting users of this package to use the `WalkDemo.action` interface?  If so, then I believe that we need to do the action message-generation here to produce the message files that they'll need.  If not, then we might as well remove `WalkDemo.action`.
content.html: Are we expecting users of this package to use the WalkDemo.action interface? If so, then I believe that we need to do the action message-generation here to produce the message files that they'll need. If not, then we might as well remove WalkDemo.action.
